name: Pipe Saga
description:
Pipe Saga is a logical puzzle game designed for the Apple Watch and the iPhone.

Your goal is to connect all the pipes by rotating them to fix water leaks.

In the "Workshop" mode, there are 2 levels of difficulty, and 100 levels in each difficulty level.
In the "Quick Work" mode, you can generate levels in 2 difficulty levels and in 4 sizes.

Hours and hours of fun :)

World rankings are managed separately on Apple Watch and iPhone so that you can compare your performance to other players.
